The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 993.77 crore. The company management includes Gautam Thapar - Chairman, R R Vederah - Non Executive Vice Chairman, B Hariharan - Group Director - Finance, Sanjay Labroo - Director, A S Dulat - Director, Ashish Guha - Director, Nandini Adya - Addnl. & Ind.Director, B Venugopal - Nominee Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 500102 and the NSE with an NSE Code of BALLARPUR.
